name: 流放之域
description:
The protagonist YeLan is exiled to a mysterious field, so she embarks on the road of escaping and finding her partner.
-----------------------------------------------------------


·Casual strategy
Use resources to build your team. Different combat units can deal with different battlefield conditions
It is necessary to select appropriate attack targets on the large map, and different regions can obtain different resources

·A tense battle
You can operate hero units. Heroes can use skills in combat. Better operation can effectively improve combat efficiency.
Soldier units fight automatically
At the same time, the game provides the function of battle speed adjustment. Rational use can save players' time or improve operation accuracy

·Rich hero units
Heroes with different abilities can play a more powerful effect with the right combination.
You can use resources to make heroes stronger, or equip your heroes with different skills

·Chapter
The game has multiple chapters. Each chapter contains a certain number of areas. Conquering key areas can open the next chapter

-----------------------------------------------------------
The total duration of the game is about 10 ~ 15 hours
